definition: to pick up/to collate or arrange/ten (banker's anti-fraud numeral)

sentences.english: Pick accuracy is affected by the mechanics of a gantry -style machine.
sentences.chinese: 門吊式貼裝機的拾取精度受其機械結構影響。

sentences.english: There are three “Pick” buttons next to “Auto” button.
sentences.chinese: 在“自動”按鈕旁邊，這裏有三個“拾取”按鈕。

sentences.english: The rest of the collision detection code below is for picking.
sentences.chinese: 下面有關碰撞檢測的代碼是是用來拾取的。

sentences.english: Armorsmithing can make a mail BP and a plate BP.
sentences.chinese: 防具大師可以製造拾取綁定的鎖甲和板甲。

sentences.english: Gleaning was allowed for the very poorest of the people.
sentences.chinese: 拾取麥穗是最窮的人所允許的。

sentences.english: Automatically announce to guild chat when someone loots an epic item that is not ignored.
sentences.chinese: 當會員拾取物品的時候，自動廣播到公會頻道。

sentences.english: Her right hand was picking up left-over wheat spikes, while a broken basket hang onto her left shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 右手拿着從田裏拾取的麥穗，左臂上懸掛着一個破筐。

sentences.english: Is not the gleaning of the grapes of Ephraim better than the vintage of Abiezer?
sentences.chinese: 以法蓮拾取剩下的葡萄不強過亞比以謝所摘的葡萄嗎。

sentences.english: New events are available with new trophies, loot chests and challenging enemies.
sentences.chinese: 新的事件有新的戰利品，拾取寶箱和敵人。

sentences.english: So she went out and began to glean in the fields behind the harvesters.
sentences.chinese: 路得就去了，來到田間，在收割的人身後拾取麥穗。

sentences.english: Asynchronous communication allows clients to pick up the response whenever the time is right.
sentences.chinese: 異步通信允許客戶機在任何適當的時候拾取響應。

sentences.english: Recirculate the clusters to allow them to pick up the new changes.
sentences.chinese: 重新循環集羣，使它們拾取新的更改。

sentences.english: Kill Lycanthoth Vandals and loot 6 Polluted Incense from their corpses.
sentences.chinese: 殺萊坎索斯蠻人拾取6個受污染的薰香。

sentences.english: Objective lens, optical pickup device, recorder and reproducer.
sentences.chinese: 物鏡，光學拾取器，記錄器和重現設備。

sentences.english: Aren't the gleanings of Ephraim's grapes better than the full grape harvest of Abiezer?
sentences.chinese: 以法蓮拾取剩下的葡萄不強過亞比以謝所摘的葡萄嗎？

sentences.english: And it will be as when one gleans the ears In the valley of Rephaim.
sentences.chinese: 又像人在利乏音谷拾取遺落的穗子。

definition: air drop/to drop supplies by air
to drag/to tow/(computing) to drag (mouse operation)
player (of a game)/enthusiast (audio, model planes etc)
to fire/to discharge/to release (fireworks, smokescreen, poison gas, virus etc)
